talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>What I have just given you is an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It is required to make use of the tools
known as <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I cannot demonstrate its utility because
there are no Zonai devices right here.
talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>I have an associate working at the river
near the base of this mountain.<sp:0:4:0>They can teach you how to use this.
talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>I have an associate in the cave ahead of
here. They are working at the other end.<sp:0:4:0>They can teach you how to use this.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>However, I have associates on the other
side of that cave system.<sp:0:4:0>They can teach you how to use this.
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I came because there is something I failed
to give you.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I hope that the <clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>I provided is
useful to you.
